HDG.BC.content: [re: clinging to beings, equating dealing w/ the actual] acting (Handeln)/effecting (Wirken) bring to experience what the actual (Wirkliche) is [?], accompanied by freedom, participation in law of age > acc. Heidegger, Nietzsche’s freedom [“for what is freedom? that one has the will to self-responsibility”] conceives being a self as will to power, freedom as will to fulfill “will to power” (Nietzsche thinks like/unlike Kant): participation in actuality of actual

HDG.WM.content: Dasein all that’s still there in anxiety, robs us of speech, because beings as a whole slip away, the nothing crowds around [proof?: I was anxious about nothing]

HDG.IWM.content: overcoming of metaphysics [Destruction] corresponded to endeavor to first learn to attend to oblivion of Being, to experience this oblivion, absorb this experience into relation of Being to man, preserve (verwahren) it there [ontological difference & Being] > in the need (Not) belonging to oblivion of Being, question: “What is metaphysics?” perhaps most necessary for thought > [Destruction] representational thought relinquished to thinking brought to pass (ereignetes) by Being itself, in thrall to Being (um dem Sein höriges Denken) [MOP, telos]: more thoughtful our thinking becomes, more purely our thinking will stand of its own accord in sole action appropriate to it [attention to Being]

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger somewhat aligns himself w/ Marx, though he insists via question that every interpretation [of genuine thinking] can/must lead to transformation (Veränderung) of world > Heidegger also insists that praxis in Marx is determined by a theory of production as production of human itself (founded in Hegelian philosophy) > theory/praxis: sisters born from unknown parents [baby daddy]

HDG.FS.content: meaning of hypothesis, thus theory, has changed: “assuming that…” as purely methodological, no ontological significance > Heidegger on exactitude of modern experimentation, yield identical repeating results, obstructs description (Beschreibung), concerns the effect (Wirkung) [cf. p. 54]: theory will change if effect does not follow, thus purely methodological

HDG.WL.content: [method] speak about speech qua speech (Die Sprache als die Sprache zur Sprache bringen): each Sprache says something different yet the Same > this Same, the oneness that’s the distinctive property of language, holds together (zueinanderhält) what is kept separate (Auseinandergehaltene)

HDG.WL.content: attempting a way to language by speaking testifies (bezeugt) that language has woven us into speaking [why?] > this web (Geflecht) is the predetermined realm (vorbestimmten Bereich) that any reflection on language (linguistic theory, philosophy of language, etc.) must live (aufhalten) [factical life of language]

HDG.WL.content: speech, not a secure possession (kein fester Besitz) > in shock, a man may be silent; in an accident, a man becomes mute (not silent) > language manifests itself in speaking (Die Sprache zeigt sich im Sprechen) as activation of organs of speech (mouth, lips, teeth, tongue, larynx)

HDG.WL.content: whenever we’re listening, we’re letting something be said to us: all conception/perception already contained in that act [quasi-Derridean, nothing outside the text]

HDG.WL.content: along the way, what looks like a tangle untangles [arrival?], release/light of way-making movement > movement brings Saying to speech, Saying keeps way open > die Be-wëgung der Sage zur Sprache ist das entbindende Band, das verbindet, indem es er-eignet [bond that binds by appropriating] > language delivered (entbunden) to its own freedom: concerned solely w/ itself > but language as Saying not only self-seeking, the appropriating showing disregards precisely itself, to free what is shown to its proper appearance [withdrawal of language, Saying, Ereignis]

HDG.OHF.content: for faith, man is “fallen,” his being-fallen not derived from God, but state into which man brought himself [explanation of Kant-like co-givenness of man’s goodness & his possibility of falling] > primordial experience of being-sinful (Sündigseins) at particular time: closed context of experience, basis of anthropology of Christian theology > [Nietzsche-like] God-relation (as constitutive) neutralized into consciousness of norms/values, center of acts (archē), “Ego-pole”

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis
